remarks: The ` S. ` integral splits on open intervals with matching endpoints. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2014.)
statement:
itgsplitioo.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
itgsplitioo.2 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
itgsplitioo.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( A [,] C ) ) $.
itgsplitioo.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( A (,) C ) ) -> D e. CC ) $.
itgsplitioo.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. ( A (,) B ) |-> D ) e. L^1 ) $.
itgsplitioo.6 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. ( B (,) C ) |-> D ) e. L^1 ) $.
itgsplitioo $p |- ( ph -> S. ( A (,) C ) D _d x = ( S. ( A (,) B ) D _d x + S. ( B (,) C ) D _d x ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d ph x $.
